version_description: Problem with adding folders from SMB servers to Favorites has been solved.

New update features played time synchronization via iCloud. Now you can start watching a movie from your server on one iOS device and end up with another!
Besides, "Reset Played Time Records" function has been incorporated. If you're all for viewing yo
New feature of deleting files and folders from SMB servers has been added

• Now image viewer saves images to the app's documents in original format;
• "Review App" option has been improved.

Music player major upgrade:
• Gapless playback including .flac files support for DLNA servers and local media;
• Music Playlists feature upgrade, m3u playlists support.

• Music files loading enhanced;
• Interface improvements.

• Playlists playback on DLNA devices improved;
• Cover arts display issues fixed.

• Quick access to file options is now available;
• Heic files support has been added.

• Interface adjustments for new iPhone XS Max;
• Performance improvements.
• Problem with Chromecast devices discovery resolved
• Apple Music playback support has been added
• Interface of Chromecast music player has been improved
• Video playback on devices with iOS 12 has been improved

• Possibility to play video files from iOS photo gallery has been added;
• Problem with incidental excessive battery consumption in course of music playback in background has been fixed;
• Playlists playback on DLNA devices has been improved.
• Current playlist of music player is now saved even after the application's restart
• Various sorting options for local files have been added; in particular, now you can also sort your files by Artist, Album, Track Number and Date.

• Interface improvements for servers section; information on upcoming updates and new features added;
• Speed of local files sorting improved.

Video player major upgrade:
• decoding speed for all video formats has been increased; full HD and 4K video playback has been improved as well;
• multichannel video playback has been improved;
• video player’s stability has been enhanced.
• Video and music playback from SMB servers has been improved
• Problem with WAV files playback has been fixed

This update opens a new page in 8player's functions - cloud service support. Since today you will be able to play your files stored on Dropbox; other most popular cloud services will follow in a short while.

• Video playback with HDMI adapter enhanced;
• Access to SMB and FTP servers improved.
• Auto detection of SMB servers (including Apple's Time Capsule and AirPort devices) has been improved
• Stability improvements and bug fixes
• Google Drive support added
• Video and music files playback from SMB servers has been improved

• Access to FTP and SMB servers improved;
• Video player stability improved.
• Operation with Chromecast devices improved
• SMBv2 servers’ support added
• Stability improvements and bug fixes
• Microsoft OneDrive support added
• Possibility of creating playlists from music files residing on Dropbox, Google Drive and OneDrive has been added
• Interface improvements
• Interface improvements for iOS 13 Dark Mode
• Operation with Google Drive improved
• Interface improvements and bug fixes
• Video player: swipe to fast-forward / rewind function fixed

• Now 8player can open media files from the Files app;
• Pull to dismiss feature improved for video and music player.
• MKV audio and subtitles playback fixed

• Shuffle option for videos playback added;
• Playback time saving is now available in music player;
• Custom backgrounds improved.

• Network Caching option for video player added;
• List of supported subtitles encodings enhanced;
• Position saving for music player improved.

• VoiceOver function enhanced;
• Playback from SMB servers improved.
• Video player improvements and bug fixes
• Video player: saving audio and subtitles track selection between launches
• Stability improvements and bug fixes

• SMB 3 support added
• Video player performance enhanced
• Operation with Chromecast devices improved
• Playback resuming function improved
